description: Increases all party members' DEF by 55%, lasting for 30m. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
bgDescription: Mortefi's signature dish, created during his time wandering in the wilderness. Despite early struggles with controlling his powers, he has now mastered the art of cooking it. A perfect balance of crispy outer layer and tender interior, it boasts a sweet and fragrant flavor while maintaining the freshness of the meat itself.
